item.description:
Facilitator: Jim Rose, M.Ed., Vice president Johnson & Johnson (ret.).

Through a series of exercises and discussions, Jim will show you how meditation can be an effective tool for resolving conflict, healing relationships, and relieving stress. He will also teach a powerful meditation technique that you will have time to practice.

(Jim is also doing a workshop on Saturday, March 27: Meditation and Conscious Living. For more information, time and location, see www.newengsos.org.)

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: THE MEDITATION SOLUTION TO STRESS, ANGER AND CONFLICT â€“ AN INTERACTIVE WORKSHOP
